offre_job-0001-2025.description: Join us as a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer to architect and implement cloud solutions. You will design scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure using industry best practices. offre_job-0002-2025.description: We are seeking a talented Python Backend Engineer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining scalable backend services that power our applications. This role requires strong problem-solving skills and experience with modern backend technologies. Develop microservices architecture using modern frameworks Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues Optimize database queries and ensure data integrity Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate APIs Participate in code reviews and technical discussions Design and implement scalable backend services and RESTful APIs

Optimize cloud costs and resource utilization Automate cloud infrastructure management Provide technical guidance on cloud best practices Ensure security and compliance in cloud environments Implement high availability and disaster recovery Design cloud-native architectures Migrate on-premise applications to cloud
offre_job-0040-2025.texte_complet: Join us as a Cloud Solutions Architect to architect and implement cloud solutions. You will design scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure using industry best practices. Optimize cloud costs and resource utilization Automate cloud infrastructure management Provide technical guidance on cloud best practices Ensure security and compliance in cloud environments Implement high availability and disaster recovery Design cloud-native architectures Migrate on-premise applications to cloud

offre_job-0041-2025.description: We need a Cybersecurity Analyst to protect our systems and data. You will be responsible for security assessments, incident response, and implementing security best practices across our infrastructure. Respond to security incidents and threats Conduct security awareness training Develop security policies and procedures Review code and architecture for security issues Conduct security assessments and penetration testing

offre_job-0042-2025.description: As a DevOps Engineer, you will be instrumental in automating our infrastructure and improving our deployment processes. We need someone who can build reliable CI/CD pipelines and ensure our systems are scalable and secure. Troubleshoot production issues and incidents Implement security best practices and compliance Optimize deployment processes and reduce downtime Automate infrastructure provisioning using IaC tools Monitor system performance and implement alerting

offre_job-0044-2025.description: We are seeking a talented Java Spring Boot Developer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining scalable backend services that power our applications. This role requires strong problem-solving skills and experience with modern backend technologies. Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate APIs Optimize database queries and ensure data integrity Develop microservices architecture using modern frameworks Design and implement scalable backend services and RESTful APIs Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues

offre_job-0047-2025.description: We are hiring a Data Scientist to help us unlock insights from our data. You will design and build data pipelines, develop ML models, and work with large-scale datasets to solve complex business problems. Develop machine learning models and algorithms Collaborate with data scientists and analysts Process and analyze large datasets Optimize data processing and storage Deploy ML models to production Implement data quality checks and monitoring

offre_job-0050-2025.description: Join our team as a Vue.js Developer to create exceptional user experiences. You will work closely with designers and backend engineers to build responsive, performant web applications using the latest frontend technologies. Build responsive and intuitive user interfaces Develop reusable UI components using modern frameworks Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs Optimize frontend performance and loading times Write unit and integration tests
